Of course.

I have to.

I have to.
No!

No.

Did he say anything to you

Surely you didn't think I'd let

SECRETARYFraulein Spielrein!

Sit down.

I tried to explain the

I'm your physician.

From now on,

You think I'm going

And there's your 20 francs.

Dear Professor Freud, I would be most

Yes.

Must have something

Oh.
